name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, and automation. Expert in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **AWS Code Pipeline**, **Azure DevOps**, and **Terraform**, with hands-on proficiency in continuous integration tools such as **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, **GitLab Pipelines**, and **Bamboo**. Skilled in managing cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring scalability and security while meeting compliance standards. 

Proficient in utilizing monitoring and assessment tools like **DataDog** and **Nagios** along with experience in configuration management using **Ansible**, **Puppet**, and **Chef**. Solid foundation in database management with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, **DynamoDB**, and **Amazon Aurora**. Brings a strong background in **Node.js** and **Python**, leveraging modern programming practices to implement efficient DevOps solutions. Passionate about building robust systems that enable agile development and operational excellence.
